verses.roman:
sṛṣṭi, sthiti, pralaya tāṅhā haite haya
sthūla-sūkṣma-jagatera teṅho samāśraya

synonyms: sṛṣṭi—creation; sthiti—maintenance; pralaya—dissolution; tāṅhā—Him; haite—from; haya—becomes possible; sthūla—gross; sūkṣma—subtle; jagatera—of the cosmic manifestation; teṅho—He; samāśraya—the only shelter.
translation: "Creation, maintenance and dissolution come from Him. He is the original shelter of all gross and subtle cosmic manifestations.
